name: auditor-edge
description: Edge API for macOS notch app - R2 uploads, D1, Vectorize, Durable Objects

scripts.migrate:local: wrangler d1 execute auditor --local --file=./migrations/001_init.sql && wrangler d1 execute auditor --local --file=./migrations/002_jobs.sql
scripts.migrate:prod: wrangler d1 execute auditor --remote --file=./migrations/001_init.sql && wrangler d1 execute auditor --remote --file=./migrations/002_jobs.sql
